# samsungcloudplatform_vpc_peerings (Data Source)

Provides a VPC Peering resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "samsungcloudplatform_vpc_peerings" "peering" {
}

output "contents" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatform_vpc_peerings.peering.contents
}
```
